CMB800.name: Cell and Molecular Biology Seminar
CMB800.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
CMB800.description: Current literature in areas including gene expression, intracellular transport, cell signalling, regulation of cell growth and cell structure.
CMB800.restrictions: Open to graduate students in the College of Natural Science or in the Cell and Molecular Biology major.

CMB880.name: Laboratory Rotation
CMB880.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
CMB880.description: Participation in research projects in laboratories of Cell and Molecular Biology faculty.
CMB880.restrictions: Open to students in the Cell and Molecular Biology major.

CMB890.name: Independent Study
CMB890.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
CMB890.description: Non-thesis research for Plan B master's students.

CMB892.name: Research Forum
CMB892.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
CMB892.description: Advanced graduate students present their laboratory research.
CMB892.restrictions: Open to students in the Cell and Molecular Biology major.

CMB899.name: Master's Thesis Research
CMB899.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year

CMB999.name: Doctoral Dissertation Research
CMB999.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
CMB999.restrictions: Open to students in the Cell and Molecular Biology major.
